com.tianscar.jme3.imgui

Class JmeImGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tianscar.jme3.imgui.JmeImGui

  • public class JmeImGui
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple helper class for use the Dear ImGui with jMonkeyEngine.

    • Method Summary

        Method to load generated font textures to GL.

      • init

        public static void init(com.jme3.system.JmeContext context,
                        java.lang.Runnable beforeInit)
        Method to initialize ImGui. Cannot be called more than once.
        Parameters:
        context - the JmeContext
        beforeInit - an interface for load additional ImGui settings

      • init

        public static void init(com.jme3.system.JmeContext context)
        Method to initialize ImGui.
        Parameters:
        context - the JmeContext

      • startFrame

        public static void startFrame()
        Method called at the beginning of the main cycle. It starts a new ImGui frame.

      • endFrame

        public static void endFrame()
        Method called in the end of the main cycle. It renders ImGui to prepare an updated frame.

      • dispose

        public static void dispose()
        Method to dispose all used ImGui resources. Can be called more than once, with the additional call nothing effects.

      • isDisposed

        public static boolean isDisposed()
        Gets whether the JmeImGui is disposed.
        Returns:
        whether disposed

        public static boolean isInitted()
        Gets whether the JmeImGui is initialized.
        Returns:
        whether initialized
